metadata.title: CVE-2015-7576 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The http_basic_authenticate_with method inactionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/http_authentication.rb in the BasicAuthentication implementation in Action Controller in Ruby on Rails before3.2.22.1, 4.0.x and 4.1.x before 4.1.14.1, 4.2.x before 4.2.5.1, and 5.xbefore 5.0.0.beta1.1 does not use a constant-time algorithm for verifyingcredentials, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypassauthentication by measuring timing differences.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7576` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionmailer - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionpack - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-actionview - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activejob - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activemodel - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activerecord - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-activesupport - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-rails - 2:4.2.6-1
ruby-railties - 2:4.2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rails package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.2.6-1').
